name: Zembrin®
description: Zembrin® is a patented, standardized and clinically studied extract of Sceletium tortuosum. It’s an innovative, evidence-based ingredient for ‘experiential’ products designed to support calmness, enhanced mood, and improved cognitive function. Zembrin can help give people power over their lives by supporting a sense of calm focus or alert serenity. Studies have shown to start working in as little as 2 hours and is safe enough to be used every day.
